title: core values

accordion.about:
We believe that the future of Latin America lies in the hands of its entrepreneurs. That's why we've created a venture capital fund dedicated to supporting early-stage startups in the region.


Our mission is to help these founders bring their bold ideas to life and drive innovation that will shape the future of the region.
accordion.label: what we believe in

accordion.about: At our core, we are founder-centric. We understand the challenges of starting a new venture, and we're here to support entrepreneurs every step of the way. We believe that success is built on strong relationships and trust, and we're committed to being transparent, responsive, and empathetic with our founders. Trust us, we walk the talk.
accordion.label: we are founder-centric

accordion.about: We're not just investors - we're connectors. We bring together a multidisciplinary team with a wealth of experience and networks across different industries. We're here to help our founders make the right connections and open doors to new opportunities.
accordion.label: we are connectors

accordion.about: Our team is our biggest differential. We come from diverse backgrounds - but we share a common passion for supporting founders along the way. We believe that our multidisciplinary approach gives us a unique perspective and allows us to provide valuable insights and resources to our portfolio companies.
accordion.label: we are multidisciplinary

description:
founder-centric
connectors
multidisciplinary approach
